entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as trying to look like a Muggle.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: A person who sets off at a brisk walk down the lane, described as wearing a frock-coat and spats.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who follows Harry and Ogden, but no further description is given.

entities.name: great hangleton
entities.description: A location mentioned on a wooden sign, described as 5 miles away.

entities.name: little hangleton
entities.description: A village nestled between two steep hills, its church and graveyard clearly visible.

entities.name: village
entities.description: The general term for the settlement of Little Hangleton.

entities.name: church
entities.description: A building in the village of Little Hangleton.

entities.name: graveyard
entities.description: The area where people are buried in the village of Little Hangleton.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore follow Ogden down the lane.
Dumbledore follows Harry, but this is an inverse relationship of the one above.
Ogden is heading towards Little Hangleton, as indicated by the sign.
Harry and Dumbledore are moving away from Great Hangleton, as indicated by the sign.
